content.rendered:
Directed by Craig Gillespie. Lake Bell. Gwyneth Horder-Payton. Hannah Fidell.

Written by Matthew Bass. Matthew Bass. Theodore Bressman. Theodore Bressman. Amanda Chicago Lewis. Robert Siegel. Robert Siegel. D.V. DeVincentis. Brooke Baker. Sarah Gubbins.

Cast Sebastian Stan( Tommy Lee ) . Seth Rogen( Rand ) . Nick Offerman( Uncle Miltie ) . Taylor Schilling( Erica ) . Pepi Sonuga( Melanie ) . Fred Hechinger( Seth Warshavsky ) . Paul Ben-Victor( Richard Alden ) . Mozhan MarnÃ²( Gail Chwatsky ) . Medalion Rahimi( Danielle ) . Adam Ray( Jay Leno ) . Iker Amaya( Nikki Sixx ) . Chris Mann( Mick Mars ) . Andrew Dice Clay( Louis ‘Butchie’ Peraino ) . Paul Guzman( Vince Neil ) . Harley Haze( Cam Girl ) . Madi Laine( Cam Girl ) . Sophia Burns( Cam Girl ) . Danielle Jane Darling( Cam Girl ) . Jennifer Stehlin( Angie ) . Jackson Lee Hill( Young Rand ) . Aaron Goddard( Roger Dennis ) . Nelson Estevez( Chauffeur ) . Lindsay Farris( Steven Hirsch ) . Sarah Oh( Traci ) . Frederic Farina( Receptionist ) . Adam Dunnells( Patches ) . Bernardo Verdugo( Bar Manager ) . David A. Garcia( Guard ) . Clint Howard( Schmitz ) . Austin Boyce( Valerie ) . Regina Saldivar( Julissa ) . Steven Hack( Burt Axelrod ) . Gabriel Sousa( Jim ) . Sadie Sieroty( Pam’s Assistant ) . Gustavo Velasquez( Bartender ) . Danielia Maximillian( Charmaine ) . Brian Huskey( Albert ) . Raymond Ma( Kenzo ) . Anthony Robert Grasso( Director ) . Barrett C. Lile( Gary Gornowitz ) . Tom Beyer( Dale ) . Carmin/epe Famiglietti( Distributor ) . Joan Almedilla( Dr. Kloke ) . Tom Michelsen( Handyman ) . Matt Harbert( Don Adams ) . Geoff Meed( Tiny ) . Rich Grosso( Distributor ) . Alessandro Garcia( Guest Services ) . Deanne Lauvin( Show Producer ) . Murphy Patrick Martin( Dan ) . Tim Halling( General Contractor ) . Francesca Xuereb( Brigitte ) . Jack Pearson( Mark ) . Rane Jameson( Riki Rachtman ) . David Paluck( Tower Manager ) . Alex Sanborn( Distributor ) . Patrick Cox( Biker ) . Jordyn Denning( Dot ) . Tripp Pickell( Officer Barnes ) . AJ Troup( Rory ) . Brian Kavanaugh( DP ) . Scott Aschenbrenner( Dennis ) . Maz Nieviarovski( Klaus ) . Stephanie Pearson( Waitress ) . Bailey Humiston( Ginny ) . Ck Bolado( Bro ) . Alex Denney( Brad ) . Jalen McKoy( Production Assistant ) . Tim Liu( Chris ) . Oscar Pereida( Chad ) . Ariana Alvarez( Waitress ) . Marvin Youssif( Shit-Talker ) . Majeed Nami( Bro ) . David Beeks( Mike ) . Ernest Glover( Evander ) . Carson Cash( Stu ) . Ryan Bergara( Shit-Talker ) . Jascha Slesers( Dutch Flight Attendant ) . Cynthia Quiles( Waitress )

Language English.

Producers D.V. DeVincentis. Megan Ellison. Dave Franco. Craig Gillespie. Evan Goldberg. Ali Krug. Mike Manning. Alex McAtee. Sue Naegle. Ron Rapiel. Seth Rogen. Michael L. Rosenfeld. Dylan Sellers. Robert Siegel. Matt Woodall. James Weaver. Sarah Gubbins.

Production Annapurna Pictures. Annapurna Television. Hulu.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 8

Status Finished (2022–2022)
